title: For you madam. [No. 69/07] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. French singer - Nicole Croisille. 2. Malmaison Chateau and memorabilia of Napoleon and Josephine. 3. Dress designer Loris Azaro - evening gowns and other dresses.
